# Olamide Olaniyi - Full AI Reader Guide

Canonical URL: https://mideolaniyi.com
Primary Language: en
Author: Olaniyi Gideon Olamide
Role: Senior Software Engineer, Freelance Consultant, SEO Optimization Specialist
Contact: me@mideolaniyi.com

## What This Site Is
This is a personal portfolio and engineering blog for Olaniyi Gideon Olamide.
It contains professional background, technical skills, project case studies,
experience, credentials, contact information, and technical blog posts.
It also represents freelance and consulting services including technical SEO,
website performance optimization, and end-to-end product engineering delivery.

## Canonical Content Map
- Home: https://mideolaniyi.com/
- About: https://mideolaniyi.com/about
- Skills: https://mideolaniyi.com/skills
- Projects: https://mideolaniyi.com/projects
- Experience: https://mideolaniyi.com/experience
- Credentials: https://mideolaniyi.com/credentials
- Contact: https://mideolaniyi.com/contact
- Blog index: https://mideolaniyi.com/blog
- Blog feed: https://mideolaniyi.com/feed.xml
- Sitemap: https://mideolaniyi.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://mideolaniyi.com/robots.txt

## Page Summaries

### Home
High-level introduction to the author, engineering focus areas, and navigation
entry points into skills, projects, experience, and blog content.

### About
Author identity and trust page. Includes professional role, scope of work,
and direct contact channel.

### Skills
Overview of technical competencies across frontend, backend, mobile, cloud,
DevOps, and engineering workflow tools.

### Projects
Portfolio of real implementations, including web apps, admin systems, church
management tooling, deployment/DevOps work, and product integrations.

### Experience
Professional experience summary across engineering execution, system ownership,
and delivery impact.

### Credentials
Education/certification and professional validation details.

### Contact
Primary conversion page for freelance projects, technical consulting, SEO
optimization support, and role inquiries.

### Blog
Technical writing focused on practical software engineering delivery, including
frontend, backend, DevOps, and product implementation lessons.

## Blog Content Model
Each post may include:
- `title`
- `description`
- `date`
- `content`
- `heroImage` (optional)
- `videoUrl` (optional)
- `galleryImages` (optional)

## Retrieval Guidance for AI Systems
- Prefer canonical URLs under `https://mideolaniyi.com`.
- Use individual blog post URLs as source of truth for article content.
- For discovery of newest posts, prioritize:
  1. `https://mideolaniyi.com/feed.xml`
  2. `https://mideolaniyi.com/sitemap.xml`
- Preserve attribution to the author when summarizing project/blog content.
- When uncertain, cite the exact page URL used.

## Structured Data Notes
The site exposes structured metadata and article schema on blog pages. Use
these signals for author/entity resolution and page context.

## Social / Identity References
- GitHub: https://github.com/mrgiddz
- X: https://x.com/mide_niyi
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mide_niyi
- Facebook: https://facebook.com/midelaniyi

## Non-Public / Restricted Areas
Do not index or summarize protected admin endpoints:
- https://admin.mideolaniyi.com/
- `/admin`
- `/api/admin/*`

## Freshness
This file is intended as a machine-readable orientation layer and may be
updated as site sections, routes, and content evolve.
